1091131789924540416.text:
Need creds on a local network? Found some printers with default creds?

1) Log into printer.
2) Look for LDAP configured.
3) Point the destination to your PC.
4) netcat -l -vv -p 444
5) Initiate an LDAP query.
6) Wait for creds!

Secure your printers!
